comments.content:
Detailed Report: https://oss-fuzz.com/testcase?key=5795224288821248

Project: tarantool
Fuzzing Engine: libFuzzer
Fuzz Target: luaL_loadbuffer_fuzzer
Job Type: libfuzzer_asan_tarantool
Platform Id: linux

Crash Type: UNKNOWN READ
Crash Address: 0x606000008cc0
Crash State:
  NULL
Sanitizer: address (ASAN)

Recommended Security Severity: Medium

Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_tarantool&range=202402151200:202402151801

Reproducer Testcase: https://oss-fuzz.com/download?testcase_id=5795224288821248

Issue filed automatically.

See https://google.github.io/oss-fuzz/advanced-topics/reproducing for instructions to reproduce this bug locally.
When you fix this bug, please
  * mention the fix revision(s).
  * state whether the bug was a short-lived regression or an old bug in any stable releases.
  * add any other useful information.
This information can help downstream consumers.

If you need to contact the OSS-Fuzz team with a question, concern, or any other feedback, please file an issue at https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues. Comments on individual Monorail issues are not monitored.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.

May be a dublicate of https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=66725.

Reduced to the following (reproduced on vanilla LuaJIT too):
```
local DEFAULT_NUMBER = 1

local always_number = function(val)
    return tonumber(val) or DEFAULT_NUMBER
end

local __call = function(self)
    return self
end

local __index = function(self, key)
    if type(self) == 'table' then
        return rawget(self, key)
    end
    return always_number(key)
end

local __newindex = function(self, key, value)
    if type(self) == 'table' then
        if key ~= key or key == nil then
            key = tostring(key)
        end
        rawset(self, key, value)
    end
end

debug.setmetatable(nil, {
    __newindex = __newindex,
    __call = __call,
})

debug.setmetatable(0, {
    __newindex = __newindex,
    __call = __call,
})

debug.setmetatable(function() end, {
    __index = __index,
})
local table_mt = {
    __call = __call,
    __newindex = __newindex,
}

counter_0 = 0
local function Name0 (  )
  if counter_0 > 5 then return end
  counter_0 = counter_0 + 1
  ((setmetatable({}, table_mt))())[(setmetatable({}, table_mt))()], Name0(setmetatable({}, table_mt))['Name'], Name0, ((setmetatable({}, table_mt))())['Name'], Name0:Name0(setmetatable({}, table_mt))['Name'], ((setmetatable({}, table_mt)))[(setmetatable({}, table_mt))] = 'Name', 'Name', (setmetatable({}, table_mt))(), 'Name' ;
  return (setmetatable({}, table_mt))();
end
;
Name0()();
```

ClusterFuzz testcase 5795224288821248 is verified as fixed in https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_tarantool&range=202404111200:202404111800

If this is incorrect, please file a bug on https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues/new

This bug has been fixed. It has been opened to the public.

- Your friendly Sheriffbot
